content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, 8.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 8.5) - working, producing water at approximately 377-380 units per minute
- Boiler at position (-4.0, 8.5) - contains water and coal, now operational
- Steam engine at position (-3.5, 13.5) - working with improved steam supply
- Connected with pipes forming a water network
- Small electric pole at position (-3.5, 16.5) connecting power to other structures
- The system is now fully operational, generating electricity consistently

### Stone Mining Facility at position (-56.0, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Top row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 5.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 5.5)
- Bottom row mining drills:
  - Electric mining drill at position (-64.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-60.5, 9.5)
  - Electric mining drill at position (-56.5, 9.5)
- Wooden chests at each drill's drop position to collect stone:
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 7.5) - partially filled with stone
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 7.5) - partially filled with stone
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 7.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-64.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-60.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
  - Chest at position (-56.5, 11.5) - contains 800 stone (full)
- Small electric poles providing power to the drills
- Transport belt network connecting the drills (partially functional)
- Producing stone at a rate of approximately 84-86 units per minute

### Stone Smelting Area at position (-56.0, 32.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces:
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 26.0) - contains stone and coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 29.0) - contains stone and coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 32.0) - contains stone and coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 35.0) - contains stone and coal, producing stone bricks
  - Stone furnace at position (-56.0, 38.0) - contains stone and coal, producing stone bricks
- Output inserters:
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 26.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 29.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 32.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 35.5)
  - Inserter at position (-54.5, 38.5)
- Output belts:
  - Transport belt at position (-52.5, 38.5)
- Small electric poles providing power to the inserters
- Currently producing stone bricks at a rate of approximately 13-46 units per minute (variable)
- All furnaces now have fuel and most have stone inputs

### Stone Wall Production at position (-54.5, 51.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 at position (-54.5, 51.5) - set to produce stone walls
- Input system:
  - Wooden chest at position (-57.5, 51.5) - contains 800+ stone bricks
  - Inserter at position (-56.5, 51.5) moving stone bricks
- Output system:
  - Inserter at position (-52.5, 51.5) moving stone walls to output chest
  - Wooden chest at position (-51.5, 51.5) collecting stone walls
- Producing stone walls at a rate that exceeds the target of 16 per minute

## ERROR TIPS

###
